name: Giant, Hellfire
description: The Giant Hellfire is a colossal creature with magical weaponry that deals additional fire damage. Its body is adorned with runes that flash green upon its death.
memorable: Its ability Death Malison curses nearby creatures, severely hindering them for a week, while it uses powerful melee and magical attacks.
goals: To serve as a guardian or protector, using its might and spells to defend its territory.
relations: It may serve alongside other fire-related creatures or elemental beings.
environment: Typically found in rocky terrains or locations associated with fire.
strengths: Resistance to fire damage, and it possesses the ability to become invisible.
weaknesses: Lacks ranged movement options apart from its spells, potentially vulnerable to non-fire damage.
attacks: Can use a Multiattack for two strikes with a Greatclub, dealing bludgeoning and fire damage or a powerful Runic Blast that halts enemy movement.
most_powerful_ability: Death Malison, which curses all nearby creatures upon its death, causing them to suffer significant disadvantages.
senses: Possesses darkvision and has a passive Perception score of 15, indicating average awareness.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception but only offers average awareness.
additional_information: Uses Stone Camouflage to hide effectively in rocky environments.
Can utilize a Runic Shield reaction to defend against incoming attacks.
Magical weapon attacks add extra fire damage.
Ability to remain invisible until it attacks, enhancing its ambush potential.
Grants disadvantage on certain saving throws to fiends affected by its abilities.
spellcasting: Can cast spells that deal force damage and control speed through its Runic Blast.

massive creature that curses upon dying
giant that uses magical fire attacks
invisible giant that deals fire damage
